page.title: 09A FARM IN STAINFORTH (3)
page.content: There are some farms where the girls do a lot of the farm work as well, but this is not the rule. The farmhouse kitchen is large and is where most of the activity takes place. Meals are cooked on a wood-burning stove, by which lie several farm cats. Some produce is grown in the large garden, but most of the supplies are brought in from the nearby town of Settle. Though the farmer uses modern machinery and modern methods of farming, he is nevertheless carrying on an ancient way of life, in which people are slow to change and like to preserve all that is good of the past.
